abstract: Therapeutic options for patients with mesothelioma remain scarce and five-year survival is a meager ten percent. According to data from three large studies, 36% of mesotheliomas harbor neurofibromatosis 2 (NF2) mutations or loss (https://bit.ly/4nGcRXk; accessed on 06.30.2025), yet no targeted therapy exists for this molecular subtype of the disease.
